jobInfo.postDescription:
• More than 2 years working experience
• Perform regular operation on cloud and tools
• Ability to build monitoring and/or tool

Must have：
Infrastructure：
1. Experience on at least one cloud system (Amazon AWS, Microsoft Azure, or Alibaba Aliyun). Manage infrastructure (setup, upgrade, integration, support, maintain) to ensure operational risk and identified and mitigated appropriately. 
2. Build customized Docker images to extend features needed by dev team. Use at least one Docker registry (DockerHub, Azure, AWS, Aliyun). Operate and diagnose K8S cluster.
3. Operation knowledge of Linux (Alpine, Ubuntu, etc.), MySQL, S3, DNS, CDN, Nginx, etc.

CI/CD：
1. Has experience to configure GitLab CI/CD. Can debug failures from backend
Monitoring
1. Has experience to use at least one cloud monitoring system (Azure Monitoring, AWS CloudWatch, New Relic). Customize monitoring metrics/reports by writing queries (SQL, Kusto).

Security： 
1. Understand practice of SSL/certificate management (request/deployment/revoke) in web scenario
2. Understand common web-based attack (SQL ingestion, fuzzing test, etc.)

Coding：
1. Code with at least one of programming languages: Python, Golang, Java or C# to automate operation asks, e.g. account management, notification, deployment, etc. 
Design and implement web application with Java Sprint/SprintBoot framework is a Plus

Read technical documentation written in English
jobInfo.address: 上海浦东新区浦东金融广场办公楼3座12楼

brandComInfo.introduce:
MHP is a leading international management and IT consultancy. We develop pioneering mobility and manufacturing solutions for multinational corporations, mid-sized companies, and disruptive startups. As a premium business and technology partner, we are shaping tomorrow’s digital future, today.

Masters of Digital Transformation.
Our consulting approach is unique, combining holistic IT and tech knowledge with deep expertise in management. This makes MHP the ideal partner for a successful digital transformation. As digitalization experts, we deliver innovative strategies on the basis of strong analysis. These turn your change processes into sustained success.

Over 4,000 employees are driving digital progress in 13 locations worldwide, for over 300 clients. We display excellence at every level.
Exceptional Career Opportunities.
We are growing quickly and offer career opportunities for entry-level candidates as well as experienced consultants.

https://www.mhp.com/en/home/
